job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for an MLOps Engineer to help streamline our ML development process and accelerate our research teams. You will be working as part of the newly created ML Platform Team, supporting 7+ teams that work "full stack". Our Research Engineers run Ops, Engineering and Science. We have built our own workflow engine. Now we want to streamline the process, adopt the right tools and super-charge the work we are doing., In this position, you will provide support to our R&D Researchers in all aspects of the MLOps lifecycle. You will also help us establish general coding standards when it comes to ML and MLOps. We want you to:
     * Assist R&D Researchers with fixing issues with their current setups (this includes troubleshooting, integrating CI/CD etc.).
     * Help define our "1 click process" to create custom services and data-pipelines.
     * Implement new tooling in the areas of orchestration, experiment tracking, service deployment, Infrastructure as Code.
     * Conduct research & implement ways to improve standardisation of environments across R&D Teams.
     * Create / Improve infrastructure for Github Actions.
     * Improve Template capabilities - you will be in charge of our basic ML repository.
job_details.full_text:
MLOps Engineer

We are looking for an MLOps Engineer to help streamline our ML development process and accelerate our research teams. You will be working as part of the newly created ML Platform Team, supporting 7+ teams that work "full stack". Our Research Engineers run Ops, Engineering and Science. We have built our own workflow engine. Now we want to streamline the process, adopt the right tools and super-charge the work we are doing., In this position, you will provide support to our R&D Researchers in all aspects of the MLOps lifecycle. You will also help us establish general coding standards when it comes to ML and MLOps. We want you to:
     * Assist R&D Researchers with fixing issues with their current setups (this includes troubleshooting, integrating CI/CD etc.).
     * Help define our "1 click process" to create custom services and data-pipelines.
     * Implement new tooling in the areas of orchestration, experiment tracking, service deployment, Infrastructure as Code.
     * Conduct research & implement ways to improve standardisation of environments across R&D Teams.
     * Create / Improve infrastructure for Github Actions.
     * Improve Template capabilities - you will be in charge of our basic ML repository.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes MLOps, streamlining ML development processes, supporting research teams, and establishing coding standards for ML and MLOps. It mentions troubleshooting, integrating CI/CD, defining '1 click process' for data pipelines, implementing tooling for orchestration, experiment tracking, service deployment, and Infrastructure as Code, as well as improving Github Actions and ML repositories. These tasks align directly with the core responsibilities and evidence profile of an ML Engineer, particularly the focus on MLOps and productionizing models from research teams.

job_tasks.justification: The role is explicitly titled 'MLOps Engineer' and the description details tasks like 'streamline our ML development process', 'supporting 7+ teams', 'run Ops', 'streamline the process, adopt the right tools', 'support... in all aspects of the MLOps lifecycle', 'establish general coding standards when it comes to ML and MLOps', 'Assist R&D Researchers with fixing issues with their current setups (this includes troubleshooting, integrating CI/CD etc.)', 'Implement new tooling in the areas of orchestration, experiment tracking, service deployment, Infrastructure as Code', 'Create / Improve infrastructure for Github Actions', and 'Improve Template capabilities - you will be in charge of our basic ML repository'.
The phrase 'streamline our ML development process' directly relates to improving the efficiency and flow of machine learning model development and deployment, a core aspect of MLOps.
Supporting multiple research teams in their ML operations is a key function of an MLOps role.
The description mentions 'Research Engineers run Ops', indicating that operational aspects are handled by research teams, and this role is to support and streamline those operations.
The goal to 'streamline the process, adopt the right tools' is a direct MLOps objective to optimize the ML lifecycle.
job_tasks.phrase: streamline the process, adopt the right tools

job_tasks.justification: Providing support for the 'MLOps lifecycle' is the primary function of an MLOps Engineer.
job_tasks.phrase: support to our R&D Researchers in all aspects of the MLOps lifecycle

job_tasks.justification: Defining a '1 click process' for creating data pipelines is a task related to automating and streamlining data infrastructure, which falls under data engineering and MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: Help define our "1 click process" to create custom services and data-pipelines

job_tasks.justification: Implementing tooling for orchestration, experiment tracking, service deployment, and Infrastructure as Code are core MLOps responsibilities.
job_tasks.phrase: Implement new tooling in the areas of orchestration, experiment tracking, service deployment, Infrastructure as Code

job_tasks.justification: Standardizing environments across R&D teams is an operational task aimed at improving consistency and manageability in ML development and deployment.
job_tasks.phrase: Conduct research & implement ways to improve standardisation of environments across R&D Teams

job_tasks.justification: Creating and improving infrastructure for Github Actions is a direct MLOps task related to CI/CD pipelines.
job_tasks.phrase: Create / Improve infrastructure for Github Actions

job_tasks.justification: Improving template capabilities for ML repositories is an MLOps task focused on standardizing and facilitating the development and deployment of ML projects.
job_tasks.phrase: Improve Template capabilities - you will be in charge of our basic ML repository
